articles.author: Dan Goodin
articles.title: Hackers can steal 2FA codes and private messages from Android phones - Ars Technica
articles.description: Malicious app required to make “Pixnapping” attack work requires no permissions.

articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Over 150 unvaccinated kids quarantined for 21 days in SC measles outbreak - Ars Technica
articles.description: The outbreak includes at least seven confirmed cases, but some are clearly being missed.

articles.author: Jaures Yip
articles.title: Quantum stocks surge after JPMorgan investing push into strategic tech - CNBC
articles.description: JPMorgan announced it would invest $10 billion in 27 specific industries, including quantum computing.
articles.content:
The rally in quantum computing names continued on Monday after JPMorgan Chase announced it as one of the areas it would invest in as part of a new initiative.
The bank said in a release that it woul… [+1554 chars]
